Description.Text: The hotel is just 2 km from the centre of Beirut and a half hour drive from Beirut Airport. Beirut Golf Club is just 6 km away and Ouzai Fishing Port is within a 25 minute drive. There is a horse track just 3 km from the hotel.

This enchanting hotel boasts a rooftop swimming pool and beautiful gardens with orange trees. All rooms are air conditioned and there is a lift in the hotel. On-site there is a restaurant and cocktail bar. WIFI and parking are available.
